Package com.intellij.util.concurrency

Class AtomicFieldUpdater<ContainingClass,FieldType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.util.concurrency.AtomicFieldUpdater<ContainingClass,FieldType>

  • public class AtomicFieldUpdater<ContainingClass,FieldType>
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class similar to AtomicReferenceFieldUpdater except: - removed access check in getAndSet() hot path for performance - new methods "forFieldXXX" added that search by field type instead of field name, which is useful in scrambled classes

    • Method Summary
